runs.comm: pitched up outside off stump, Jayawardene gets forward and pushed back past the stumps, mid-on comes fine but they scamper one
touch shorter, coming back in towards the stumps, blocked into the leg side and again they steal a single
length ball, leaving Jayawardene off the pitch and it goes too far, he can't get a bat on it, though Bairstow makes a good take
angling in off a slightly short length, turned into a gap at midwicket
this seams back in, short of a length and jagging in, Dilshan gets an inside edge on to his groin and Finn fields in his follow-through
pitched up a little more, tight line on off stump and pushed to mid-off
short and ever-so-slightly wide from Finn, terrific pick-up from Dilshan, who stands still and drills a back-foot drive through cover-point for the first boundary of the innings
length ball, maybe a touch slow, on leg stump and rolls away off the pad behind square
tries the bouncer, good pace on it and Dilshan isn't in control of the hook shot, a top edge looping safe towards deep midwicket
short of a length again, doesn't get up that much and Dilshan misses trying to pull, it's only an inching or two from clipping the top of off too
dropped him! Dernbach got bounce this time, it took the shoulder of the bat and flew around head height to Graeme Swann, who grasped at it, popped it up in the air and over his own head
another good lifter from Dernbach, banging the ball in and it fizzes up off the surface past the outside edge
pushed through on a fullish length, Jayawardene is hit on the pad trying to play across the line ... but it was probably sneaking down leg
throat-bothering delivery from Finn, jarring the splice of the bat and Dilshan does well to drop it into the leg side
bouncer, at the man and Jayawardene swivels to pull majestically over long leg - looked like it had gone all the way but signalled four
length ball, teasing and in the corridor, holds its line and Jayawardene plays and misses
another unsuccessful flash outside off from the batsman, beaten for pace
touch full, outside off, gets forward and chances a single to mid-off
good length, Dilshan plays it on the up, cutting into the ground, can't get it off the square though
this is a cracking start from Dernbach, another rising delivery off the pitch beats the outside edge as Jayawardene plays a big, booming drive
well, that's quite a comeback! Touch short but not heinously so, Jayawardene seizes on it and swings it high over long leg with barely a blink
dug in again and pulled hard, rolls the wrists and it goes flat to deep square leg for one
short and wide and uppercut all the way over third man! Wright gave it the Superman dive on the rope but it was well over his head
down the leg side, Dilshan tries to scoop but it's too wide and called as much
slower ball on leg stump, waits for it and tucks to leg
another slower delivery out the back of the hand, bounces up off the pitch and Jayawardene taps it down into the leg side for another single
touch short, at the body, Jaya swivels adroitly but can only bung his pull straight to short fine leg
pitched up outside off and Jayawardene gives it the full gun, smashing a drive straight a Samit Patel, who puts himself in harm's way to stop it smartly. At least he's got a bit of cushioning
back of a length and pulled through square leg for one

got him, hit on the back pad and given! The ball came back at Dilshan, hitting him right in front, the only question was height - Finn doesn't get too many lbws off length deliveries - but it was good enough to convince Steve Davis
low full toss, slightly wide of off and Sangakkara reaches out to push a couple through the covers
edged but it dies on Bairstow and runs through his legs for four! Good bowling from Finn but more runs on the board for Sri Lanka
nice line and length to begin with, shaping away and beats the outside edge - in fact Bairstow thinks there might have been a nick
Jayawardene backs away and throws the bat violently at a length ball - another miss
drags this short, Jaya is late on it and the ball cannons into his body and then down on to the pitch ... join the dots
oooooh, that's close to being caught at extra-cover! The ball stuck in the pitch, Jayawardene drove on the up and it looped just over the fingertips of Bopara
full of a length, pushed towards point
pitched up wide of the stumps, jams his bat down and squirts one to backward point as they take on the fielder successfully
tossed up and turning to leg, Jayawardene advances and gets just a tickle, short fine leg gives chase and just prevents four
reverses the hands, ready for a full ball from Swann, paddling it past the infield for four to third man
tossed up and turned to midwicket on the front foot
dropped short on the leg side, they hustle through and Morgan's throw to the bowler's end is wayward
round the wicket to the left-hander, tossed up outside off and pushed to point, there's a moment's hesitation but the fielder doesn't take it cleanly
flighted outside the line of off, reverse sweeps again but this time to short third man, they still grab one
length ball, seaming in a touch, worked through square leg on the back foot
that's superbly place by Sangakkara, stepping out and flicking the ball from leg stump into a gap between deep backward square and long leg
fullish outside off and driven to the man at point
pitched up on middle and off, worked back on the leg side and Bopara fields
slower ball, on the stumps, tapped towards midwicket for one
beats the outside edge with a length ball that drifts in, Jayawardene prodded from the crease and the ball nestled in Bairstow's gloves
tossed up on off stump, gets on the front foot and pushes into a gap at cover
spinning in from outside off, Jayawardene pirouettes and takes one to deep backward square leg
is that a drop? Maybe. Sanga trying a back-foot force and beaten by the pace, but it clanged in and out of Bairstow's gloves
tossed up on off stump, gets forward and pushes into the off side
fabulous wrist work from Jaya, reversing the hands again and happy-slapping four to third man
pushed through a touch quicker outside off, blocked to point and fielded quickly
tossed up on middle and off, Sanga is quickly down on one knee to clatter the ball over midwicket but there's a man in the deep and it'll just be one
turn and bounce from Patel, Jaya goes back and is beaten past the outside edge
touch short and wide, lacerates a cut shot through backward point, beats the fielder's dive and gallops into unguarded space
floated up on the stumps, hits the pad but sliding past leg
down the leg side again and swept via a bottom edge, it runs fine and that's four more
tossed up on the stumps and trickled to mid-on for a single
tossed up outside off, slapped towards midwicket and caught! Didn't get the placement right and the fielder runs in and takes a super catch diving forward low to the ground, big wicket for England

tossed up outside off again, edged and caught behind! A thin nick and England have two huge breakthroughs in a couple of balls. It was nicely floated up, Sangakkara pressed forward outside off and got a thin edge through to Bairstow. The batsman looked pretty unhappy but the umpire's finger went up quickly
floated onto off stump, forward and blocked back to the bowler
hello, massive slog sweep from outside off and gets it to deep midwicket for a one bounce four, fine shot against the spin, big strike, fielder goes back
this is reversed and four more! Amazing batting, reversed the hands and took it off the same line this time to the third man fence, really well timed again
length ball, skids on quicker, blocked around off stump
yorker length just outside off, swung and missed
length outside off, left alone this time
step down the wicket, swing and a miss to a ball just outside off, length again
length ball, around off stump, punched off the back foot into extra cover
length ball outside off, a swing over mid off, welcome boundary, struck well, giving himself a little room outside leg stump
full toss on middle but again the batsman backs away and slaps it past mid off for four
length ball around off stump, chipped over extra cover, opened the face past to get it in the gap
goes for a huge reverse sweep, slapped straight to point, caught that hard
tossed up outside off, big spin and it misses the attempted drive and evades the keeper
and this turns big again, from outside off down the leg side, runs past the keeper again
off stump, slapped to extra cover
turns for the reverse sweep again and misses, struck on the pad outside off
length ball outside off, goes to guide it to third man and misses
slower ball outside off, cut to cover point
leg side, Bairstow saves well
full outside off, cracked down wide of long off, couple here
flashed outside off again, a dive at short third man but the edge is just short of Hales, good save though
floated up, dug out into the off side, sharp single, extra cover does well and they're going to have a check but the dive is in time
slower ball again, blocked towards point
full ball, punched down the ground, long off comes around and they scramble two
back on his stumps, dropped towards short third man and again they scamper through, running has been very good
length ball, sets himself and slaps out to deep square leg, Finn saves well down low
down the wicket and slugged over midwicket, sails over the rope, he didn't quite get to the pitch but got enough bat on it over the rope
punched down to long on
slog swept and it carries all the way for six again, tallest man out there, Finn, on the rope but he can't reach it and another maximum
full ball just outside off, slapped wide of long off, a slide from the fielder and gets it all the way to the rope, top shot again
length just outside off, angled down to third man

back of a length, pulled off high on the bat and taken by midwicket. It just skidded on a little bit, he was late on the pull stroke and chipped it not quite over Bopara's head who took a good catch retreating. England needed a wicket badly but that's a great little innings

back of a length and dragged it on another double strike bringing England back into the innings again. Again the pull stroke was late and this is a bottom edge onto leg stump, another well-set man goes
back of a length just outside off, guided towards third man where Dernbach slides and saves brilliantly
short ball rears up and it's kept out on the crease
full and just wide of off stump, dug out towards point
length ball, sliding across the left-hander, goes to drive without moving the feet, misses
outside off, fuller this time, cracked out to deep cover
outside off, goes for the vacant midwicket area on the pull, misses by a distance, beaten for pace
short ball outside of, sliced in the air, just over mid off's head, Broad couldn't get across in time with the dive, unlucky for Finn, one short too, poor running for once
yorker length on leg stump, runs off the pad towards point
and starts down the leg side
full ball on the stumps, whipped out towards midwicket and can't quite take it, just didn't pick it up properly and it falls in front of him by a fraction, saved the boundary though
length ball and this time crashed over deep square leg's head, smashed that was, flat six
yorker length outside off, reached for and missed
bumper outside off, ignored, hoping for the wide I think but it was within the margins
fired in to off stump, a swing brings an inside edge down to long leg, Finn scrambles well and saves the second
sets himself and slugs it from outside off over long on, big strike and a great time to pick up a maximum
full but too wide outside off
oh that is huge, slapped from outside off, on a length just outside off and picked up brilliantly, clubbed over the fielder, not a great delivery though, in the slot
much better, full and wide, carved down to third man
length again, slugged into the leg side, doesn't get it and bloops short of the deep square leg, another couple though
full toss around leg stump, backs away and angles it past backward point for four to third man, very lucky, leading edge was trying to go leg side
slower ball on the stump and a swing and a miss and out goes the off stump. Broad gets his man but damage done here. Was trying to go big over the leg side and missed by a distance
cutter that comes back in from a length and just goes past the off stump as it was tried to be back-cut
length around middle and leg, whacked to deep square leg, fielded well
yorker-length, slapped down to long off, got the delivery slightly too full
full just outside off and they take two to long off, that is not great fielding at all, it was straight to the man coming in off the rope, poor throw from Buttler
another good yorker, dug out to extra cover, a stupid throw gives away an overthrow
slower short ball, paddled out to deep square leg
full and outside off, left alone thinking it was wide but you don't get a wide when you step across your stumps
